tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Hyperparameters (
  experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  learning_rate DECIMAL,
  batch_size INTEGER,
  optimizer VARCHAR(50),
  loss_function VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE hyperparameters (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50),
    momentum FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_configurations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    epochs INT,
    validation_split FLOAT,
    loss_function VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    hyperparameters_id UUID,
    training_config_id UUID,
    experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
    accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Hyperparameters (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learning_rate FLOAT,
    batch_size INT,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50),
    dropout_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ModelConfigurations (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    num_layers INT,
    activation_function VARCHAR(50),
    dropout BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingMetrics (
    run_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loss FLOAT,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    validation_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    run_id INT,
    epoch INT,
    training_time TIMESTAMP,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    model_id INT,
    run_id INT,
    training_status BOOLEAN
);
